description:
Pasha De Cartier Eau De Toilette - Timeless Masculine Elegance

Experience the commanding presence of Pasha De Cartier Eau De Toilette, a distinguished Cartier masterpiece that embodies sophistication and refined masculinity. This iconic men's fragrance has established itself as a bestselling scent for the modern gentleman who appreciates classic luxury with a contemporary edge. âœ¨

The Essence of Pasha De Cartier

Created by master perfumer Jacques Cavallier, this legendary cologne offers a perfect balance of aromatic freshness and deep, sensual warmth. The 100ml bottle captures the essence of power and prestige that defines the Cartier fragrance legacy. ðŸ”¥

Product Information
Size 100ml
Gender Men
Product Type Eau De Toilette
Concentration Medium (8-12%)
Brand Cartier

Captivating Fragrance Notes

The Pasha De Cartier scent profile delivers a sophisticated aromatic-fougÃ¨re composition that evolves beautifully throughout the day. ðŸŒ¿

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Lavender, Mint, Caraway, Anise, Mandarin Orange, Brazilian Rosewood
Heart Notes Coriander, Rose, Labdanum
Base Notes Sandalwood, Oakmoss, Patchouli, Cedar

Key Features of Pasha De Cartier Eau De Toilette

  • Distinctive aromatic fougÃ¨re composition with remarkable longevity ðŸ’Ž
  • Elegant bottle design inspired by the iconic Pasha watch collection
  • Moderate sillage perfect for professional settings and evening occasions
  • Versatile fragrance suitable for year-round wear
  • Signature Cartier craftsmanship and attention to detail

The Legacy of Pasha De Cartier

Launched in 1992, Pasha De Cartier was inspired by the Pasha of Marrakech, who commissioned Cartier to create a waterproof watch in the 1930s. The fragrance captures this same spirit of luxury and innovation. The distinctive bottle design echoes the architectural elements of the watch, with its bold, circular shape and decorative cap. Like many new arrivals in the luxury fragrance world, Pasha continues to influence modern perfumery with its timeless appeal. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Pasha De Cartier Eau De Toilette last on skin?

Pasha De Cartier offers impressive longevity for an Eau De Toilette, typically lasting 6-8 hours on most skin types. The aromatic notes create an initial impact, while the woody base notes ensure the fragrance maintains its presence throughout the day. For extended wear, apply to pulse points and clothing (test fabric compatibility first) or layer with the complementary sandalwood-rich body products from the Cartier collection. ðŸŒ¸
